project.name: |---- 018-starbuzz-forms
project.description:
This project is based on 015-starbuzz-html5 and adds an order form.
HTML elements: + form : for forms within a page + input type="text" : textfields + input type="radio" : radio buttons + input type="number" : number textfield + input type="date" : date selection + input type="checkbox": checkbox + input type="submit" : for buttons + textarea : for multiline textfields + select, option : for drop-downs
form.html : A basic web form with some form elements and basic CSS styling. The form links to the starbuzz.css but also defines an additional CSS file which includes specific styles for the form.
